flawed_nl_solution:
After the first segment, there are 100 - 10 = <<100-10=120>>120 racers left in the race.
After the second segment, 120 / 3 = <<120/3=40>>40 racers are eliminated.
This leaves 120 - 40 = <<120-40=80>>80 racers to compete in the third segment.
After the third segment, 80 / 2 = <<80/2=40>>40 more racers are eliminated.
This leaves 80 - 40 = <<80-40=40>>40 racers to run in the final section of the race.
#### 40

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 90, not 120. It appears there was a miscalculation with the digits before the final zero.
